termsPage.introLine1: Welcome to Manqiyou. Please read the following terms carefully before using our services.
termsPage.introLine2: By using our services, you agree to these Terms of Service.

service.title: 1. Service Description
service.content: Manqiyou provides cycling tourism related services, including but not limited to:

items.3: Sales of cycling gear and local goods

responsibility.title: 2. User Responsibilities
responsibility.content: As a user, you agree to:

items.1: Provide true and accurate personal information
items.2: Keep account credentials secure and be responsible for account activities
items.3: Comply with applicable laws, regulations, and platform rules
items.4: Respect the rights of other users and partners
items.5: Not engage in any behavior that may harm the platform

booking.title: 3. Booking & Cancellation
booking.content: After booking is confirmed, please follow the instructions in the confirmation. Cancellation policies vary by product—please read terms carefully before booking:

items.1: Cancel 7+ days before departure: full refund
items.3: Cancel within 3 days of departure: no refund
items.4: Cancellation due to force majeure (e.g., weather): full refund or reschedule

safety.title: 4. Safety Notice
safety.line1: Cycling activities involve certain risks. Participants should have appropriate physical conditions and riding skills.

items.4: Ride within your ability and take breaks

ip.title: 5. Intellectual Property
ip.content: All content on Manqiyou (including but not limited to text, images, videos, trademarks, and route designs) is protected by intellectual property laws and may not be used without authorization.

disclaimer.title: 6. Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: To the extent permitted by law, Manqiyou is not liable for:

items.2: Service interruption due to force majeure
items.4: Consequences caused by violation of these terms

contact.title: 7. Contact
contact.content: If you have any questions, please contact us:

privacyPage.introLine2: This policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information.

collect.title: 1. Information Collection
collect.content: We collect information you provide while using Manqiyou services, including but not limited to:

items.5: Location information (for navigation and route recommendations)

use.title: 2. Information Use
use.content: We use the collected information to:

items.1: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
items.3: Send service notifications and marketing messages
items.5: Analyze data to improve user experience

protect.title: 3. Information Protection
protect.content: We take appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure, including:

share.title: 4. Information Sharing
share.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information in the following situations:

items.2: When necessary to complete a transaction (e.g., payment providers)
items.3: When required by laws and regulations
items.4: To protect our or others' legitimate rights and interests

rights.title: 5. Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. To exercise these rights, please contact us through the methods below.

contact.title: 6. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

hero.title: About Manqiyou
hero.subtitle: Encounter Infinite Beautiful Life Through Cycling

story.title: Brand Story
story.content: Since 2006, our products have been exported to 32 countries and regions worldwide. In 2020, Manqiyou brand was officially founded, committed to building a premium cross-border cycling lifestyle platform. We combine German-heritage smart E-BIKEs with deep cycling routes to provide riders with a one-stop cycling experience.

ebike.title: Tour E-Assist Bicycle
ebike.subtitle: German Heritage · Smart Cycling
ebike.tagline: Completely solving the fundamental contradiction between deep exploration and physical exhaustion

ebikePage.heroSubtitle: An ultra-light e-bike like no other
ebikePage.introLine1: Effortlessly glide through the city, laughing and riding with your companions.
ebikePage.introLine2: Lightly pedal—let Tour carry you forward.
ebikePage.designDesc: Minimalist frame, unforgettable at first sight
ebikePage.designDescFull: Whether parked at a coffee shop or speeding past traffic on the road, that unforgettable minimalist frame is unmistakably Tour.
ebikePage.carbonDescFull: Combining extreme lightness with strength, the handcrafted carbon fiber frame delivers precise and smooth handling.

lightweight.title: Light & Portable
lightweight.desc: The ultra-light diamond frame makes Tour easy to lift and carry with you.

smartAssist.title: Smart Power Assist
smartAssist.desc: Intelligent sensing delivers precise power assistance exactly when you need it.

charging.title: One-Touch Charging
charging.desc: Stop for a moment and easily connect the standard charger.
charging.chargerDescFull: Included by default—lightweight and portable, charge anywhere you go.

beltDrive.title: Silent Belt Drive
beltDrive.descFull: Durable patented design for a smooth and quiet riding experience—ride with confidence.

models.tour1sDesc: Full carbon fiber frame and fork. Full carbon seatpost, handlebar, and wheelset.
models.tour1Desc: Full carbon fiber frame and fork. Aluminum seatpost, handlebar, and wheelset.

strong.title: Built Tough
strong.desc: Carbon fiber frame, durable and strong
